titles: An elegie upon the Earle of Essex's funerall.
author: Wild, John.
notes: Signed at end: J.W. [i.e. John Wild].
Verse - "And are these all the rites that must be done,".
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Octob: 29"; after J. W.: "ild".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Essex, Robert Devereaux, --  Earl of, 1591-1646 --  Death and burial --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
